imdg_classes.name: Explosives
imdg_classes.description: Substances and articles which have a mass explosion hazard
imdg_classes.compatibility_notes: Keep away from heat and sources of ignition

imdg_classes.name: Gases
imdg_classes.description: Compressed, liquefied or dissolved under pressure gases

imdg_classes.name: Flammable Liquids
imdg_classes.description: Liquids which give off flammable vapors at or below 60°C
imdg_classes.emergency_procedures: Use foam, CO2, or dry chemical extinguishers

imdg_classes.name: Flammable Solids
imdg_classes.description: Solids which are readily combustible or may cause fire

segregation_rules.4.2: Keep dry and away from moisture

imdg_classes.emergency_procedures: Use dry sand or special extinguishing agents

imdg_classes.name: Oxidizing Substances
imdg_classes.description: Substances which may cause or contribute to combustion

imdg_classes.name: Toxic and Infectious Substances
imdg_classes.description: Substances liable to cause death or injury if inhaled, swallowed, or contact with skin

imdg_classes.name: Radioactive Material
imdg_classes.emergency_procedures: Evacuate area, contact radiation safety officer

imdg_classes.name: Corrosive Substances
imdg_classes.description: Substances which may cause damage to living tissue or other materials
imdg_classes.emergency_procedures: Use copious amounts of water, neutralizers

imdg_classes.name: Miscellaneous Dangerous Goods
imdg_classes.description: Substances presenting dangers not covered by other classes

A: Safe with D, E, F, G
B: Safe with C, D, E, F, G
C: Safe with B, D, E, F, G
D: Safe with A, B, C, F, G
E: Safe with A, B, C, F, G
